relating to the nose: Rhinoplasty is colloquially referred to as a nose job. Chronic sufferers of rhinosinusitis are experiencing the body's over-reactive immune response to fungi in the air.
More examplesFewer examplesCan anyone suggest a good rhinoplasty surgeon?There was no recent history of headache, chills, sweats, sore throat, or rhinorrhea.Those with fevers were excluded from the study, since their colds are unlikely to result from rhinoviruses.
